channel.title: Comments on: June 2014 – Is TDD Dead?
channel.description: A user group for Agile, XP, Software Craftsmanship and Software Development, based in Stafford

item.title: By: Trevor Adams
item.dc:creator: Trevor Adams
item.description: I was unable to attend, do let me know how it went!
item.content:encoded: I was unable to attend, do let me know how it went!

item.title: By: Paul Boocock
item.dc:creator: Paul Boocock
item.description: Sounds good and I'll hopefully be there. Nothing on meetup.com at the moment though.
item.content:encoded: Sounds good and I’ll hopefully be there. Nothing on meetup.com at the moment though.
